revised_title: Immuno-Ultrastructural Localization of Sodium Channels in Rat Optic Nerve
tldr: The study demonstrates the immuno-ultrastructural localization of sodium channels at nodes of Ranvier and perinodal astrocytes in the rat optic nerve using polyclonal antibody 7493. The results show intense immunoreactivity at the axon membrane at nodes of Ranvier and variable reactivity within nodal axoplasm. Additionally, sodium channel-related immunoreactivity was present within perinodal astrocyte processes, suggesting an active role for these cells in the aggregation of sodium channels within the axon membrane at the node of Ranvier.
